channel.title: serendipity on Remote Work Library
channel.description: Recent content in serendipity on Remote Work Library

item.title: Virtual Coffee Breaks
item.description: Breaks are important. Whether at the water cooler, the coffee machine or the tea kettle: Taking breaks, especially together with your colleagues, is important. What usually just happens in normal office routine needs some assistance in a remote work situation.

item.title: Remote Team Events
item.description: To keep up a great team spirit it is important to regularly meet with your team members â€“ also in a remote work setting. But how can you do remote team events on a larger scale?
